column1: "comment": "Problem is marked as orphan by Cloud guard. It has not been updated since 96 hours."

column2: unauthenticated access to a bucket. A public bucket that has read access enabled for anonymous users allows anyone to obtain object metadata

column1: "recommendation": "Ensure that the bucket is sanctioned for public access
column3: direct the OCI administrator to restrict the bucket policy to allow only specific users access to the resources required to accomplish their job functions."
